rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast nonartifact spells.
{2}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Processed Food: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Processed Food, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it. The token can’t be sacrificed until your next turn.
notes:
Changed back name, changed art, changed flavor text
Front: 4MV 3/3 —> 3MV 1/3
